::FZ/Perndabot::

FZ exits the CR room, Perndabot following him. They enter the bridge 
of the Iron Fist, taking a different way and not passing Zardus. It 
would be a bit hard to explain Zardus's 'clone' to new recruits.

FZ sits down in front of a console, looking at scanner reports. He 
frowns.

"After we attacked the Maximals like this," he says to 
Perndabot, "They might retaliate. Go to the new Predacon base and see 
if you can get on friendly terms with them."

Perndabot nods, walking out of the room. He exits the Iron Fist, 
flying off toward the Black Fortress.
